title: definevalue
author: definevalue
content: Ive been on the fence about hosting one of these not really sure if i'm seeing the purpose I haven't found a good readme yet either. If someone has a link. I have a umbrel OS running both lightning & core node an also a core node on my desktop but just not sure whats best for utilizing them.
